SEARCH
Package dao

Class LoansDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.LoansDAO
public class LoansDAO extends Object
The LoansDAO class provides data access methods for managing the loans of books in a library. It includes methods for loaning books, returning books, checking availability status, and retrieving loan information.

    • loanBook

      public void loanBook(User user, Book book) throws SQLException
      Loans a book to a user by recording the loan in the database and changing the book's availability status.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who is borrowing the book
      book - the book to be loaned to the user
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • checkAvailableStatus

      public boolean checkAvailableStatus(Book book) throws SQLException
      Checks the availability status of a given book in the library database.
      Parameters:
      book - the book whose availability status is to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the book is available, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access

    • returnBook

      public void returnBook(User user, Book book) throws SQLException
      Updates the return date of a borrowed book for a specific user in the database and changes the book's availability status.
      Parameters:
      user - the user returning the book
      book - the book being returned
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • changeAvailableStatus

      public void changeAvailableStatus(Book book, int condition) throws SQLException
      Changes the availability status of a given book based on its current loan status in the database.
      Parameters:
      book - the book whose availability status is to be changed
      condition - an integer representing a condition that may influence the availability status
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • loanForNextUser

      public void loanForNextUser(LocalDate localDate) throws SQLException
      Processes and loans a book to the next user in the reservation list based on the given reservation date.
      Parameters:
      localDate - the date on which the reservation was made
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • loanForOnlyId

      public void loanForOnlyId(int userId, int bookId, LocalDate reservationDate) throws SQLException
      Records a loan of a book to a user by inserting the loan details into the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user borrowing the book
      bookId - the ID of the book being borrowed
      reservationDate - the date the book was reserved
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getAllLoans

      public List<Loan> getAllLoans(User user) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all loan records associated with a specific user from the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose loan records are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Loan objects representing the loans made by the user.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • hasLoanedBook

      public boolean hasLoanedBook(User user, Book book) throws SQLException
      Checks whether a specific user has loaned a specific book and has not returned it yet.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose loan status is to be checked
      book - the book to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the user has loaned the book and not yet returned it, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getAllUserLoans

      public List<Loan> getAllUserLoans() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all loan records from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Loan objects representing all loans in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
